text: Place the soy milk and water into a heavy-based saucepan.  Heat to boiling point.  Heat the margarine in a separate pan. Add the sugar and mix with a wooden spoon. Pour in the hot milk mixture when the sugar has dissolved.  Add a pinch of salt. Mix well. Continue to boil gently, stirring frequently, for another 5 minutes, or until it thickens a little.  Remove from heat and leave to cool. The vegan condensed milk is now ready for use as wished. Finished.
